ingredients: 1/2 cup Wish-Bone® Bruschetta Italian Dressing, divided
2 large zucchini and/or yellow squash, halved lengthwise
1 large sweet onion, sliced into 1/2-inch thick rounds
8 ounces pappardelle pasta nests or fettuccine, cooked according to package directions, reserving 1/4 cup pasta water
1/4 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves, very thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. crumbled low sodium feta cheese
